nus_course_name: Complex Systems Design: From Mission to Prototype

past_courses.justification: Introduces system thinking and complex design principles relevant to requirements and architecture.
Covers ideation and prototyping methods applicable to multidisciplinary engineering design.
Provides project planning and risk mitigation frameworks useful in complex design workflows.

direct_oulu_links.justification: Overlaps with conceptual modeling and dynamic system behavior relevant to complex design.
Team-based prototype development and experimental execution overlap with practical design.
